item.title: Prayer problem
item.dc:creator: @gary1988 gary1988
item.description:
@gary1988 wrote:

case 84:
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2067;
plr.playerLevel[5] -= 3;
if (!plr.protMelee) {
hitDiff = 20 + Misc.random(40);
} else {
hitDiff = 0;
}
break;

that bit of code there is to get the prayer protect from melee working on a npc id code is 84 (black demon) trouble is i get “duplicate case” come up when i compile coz i already case 84 up the top of the npc manager for the hitdiff >.< so basically i know its wrong to have the npc id number as the case number but ive never done ANY thing with prayer before so im a little stumped =/

if any one can help then thats great
(not asking to be “spoon fed”)
all i ask i someone can point me in the right direction, thanks
the source base is richscapev4

Read full topic
